metadata.title: CVE-2018-3182 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: DML). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.12 and prior.Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
